fields.fieldTitle: What is the name of the product / service you are demonstrating?

fieldHint.hint1: "The name of the product / service I'm demonstrating is _____."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: ClickFunnels; Funnel Scripts; Super Keyword Scraper, etc.
Ex: funnel builder software; push-button copywriting software; keyword research software, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the #1 biggest benefit this product / service offers?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: create money-making funnels in minutes; write money-sucking sales copy at the click of a mouse; compress 10 hours of keyword research into 22 seconds, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the biggest pain this product / service eliminates?

fieldHint.hint1: "With this product / service you can aovid _____."

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: being held hostage by your web guy; paying an expensive copywriter one thin dime; struggling for days to find the right keywords to target in your ads and content marketing, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the BIG payoff for users? (VERB)

fieldHint.hint1: This makes it easy and fast to _____.

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: set up your own funnels yourself to sell anything you can think of; come up with all the ads, emails, webinars, and other sales copy you need to sell anything; find the hot, profitable, "hidden" keywords your competitors are missing in their research, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What's the #1 usual alternative people think of when they try to accomplish what this product or service does?

fieldHint.hint1: Most people think you have to _____ to get results.

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: hire a nerdy webmaster living in his mom's basement; hire an expensive copywriter who'll take forever; drive yourself crazy trying to compile and analyze thousands of keywords by hand, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What critical points / steps do you want to cover as you explain or show the product or service?

fieldHint.hint1: Here are the things I want to cover during the demo: _____." Hit "Enter" after each line to create a new bullet"

fields.fieldTitle: What is all the stuff they don't need to pay for / endure / do anymore once they have the product / service you're demonstrating? (3-4 Bullet list)

fieldHint.hint1: Here's a list of all the things you won't need to do / pay for / endure / suffer from: _____." Hit "Enter" after each line to create a new bullet

fields.fieldTitle: What is the price of your product or service?
What's an alternative way to express / compare the cost of your product / service?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: dinner for 4 at one of those gut buster buffet restaurants (you know the one); hiring a copywriter to write just 3 emails for you; a large everything pizza at your local italian restaurant, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: How fast can they see results?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: less than 45minutes; less time than it takes to bake a frozen pizza; 30 seconds, etc

fields.fieldTitle: Why should they grab this now?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: you're just one funnel away from changing your life and the life of your family; we've already raised the price 3 times and we can't keep it at this level forever; we only have 100 available at this price, etc

fields.fieldTitle: What is your guarantee / risk reversal?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: 30-day money back guarantee; empty jar guarantee, etc

fields.fieldTitle: What is your call to action? What do you want them to do next?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: sign up for the free 14 day trial and take ClickFunnels for a spin; watch the amazing training we have for you on 3 secrets of copywriting plus even more cool demos to save you time and money; grab your copy of the software from the link below right now, etc.
